long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Google Webmaster Tools - Bulk URL Removal

This extension allows you to remove multiple URLs from Google Search Console (formerly Webmaster Tools) in bulk. Instead of manually copying and pasting each URL, simply create a CSV file with the URLs you want to remove, upload it, and click remove.

  🚀 NEW UPDATED VERSION - 2024
  ⭐️ Keep track of the progress of your bulk removal job
  ⭐️ Pause and restart the bulk removal process
  ⭐️ Display the number of removed urls, pending urls, and urls that error out.
  ⭐️ Ability to download a csv report of each url removal status.

Google limits removals to 1000 URLs per 24 hours. If you need to remove more, divide them into batches of 1000 and submit each batch daily.

For details on the CSV format, visit: https://github.com/noitcudni/google-search-console-bulk-url-removal/#csv-format.

Upload your CSV file by clicking the green trash can icon to start the removal process.

For support, file an issue on GitHub: https://github.com/noitcudni/google-webmaster-tools-bulk-url-removal/issues

Note: This is a paid product. $15/month or $50/year.
